channel.title: Rust on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Blog

item.title: Learning Rust
item.description: Learning Rust as an Application Developer I don’t have a CS degree, and was never forced to sit through an operating systems class. I feel pretty comfortable reading C, and have used Linux as my daily driver for years, so I’m not a total novice when it comes to systems, but it’s definitely outside of my development experience, which has mainly been with Java and to a lesser extend JavaScript.
